name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-chrome-built-in-ai-summarise-page-content
title: SharePoint Page Summarization with Chrome Built-in AI (Gemini Nano)
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates a SharePoint Framework web part that uses Chrome's built-in Summarizer API (Gemini Nano) to summarize SharePoint page content with multilingual support, translation, caching, and permission-based access control. All AI processing runs entirely in the browser.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates a SharePoint Framework web part that uses Chrome's built-in Summarizer API (Gemini Nano) to summarize SharePoint page content with advanced features including:
- On-device AI processing (no external API calls)
- SharePoint list caching for generated summaries
- Automatic language detection and translation support
- Multilingual support (English, Japanese, Spanish, Italian, French)
- Permission-based access control (only editors can generate summaries)
- Smooth animations and modern UI with Fluent UI React
- Integration with Microsoft Graph API for page content extraction
All AI processing runs entirely in the browser using Chrome's on-device AI capabilitiesâ€”no server-side APIs or Azure functions required.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.

references.name: Chrome Built-in AI
references.description: Chrome's built-in AI APIs provide on-device machine learning capabilities including summarization, translation, and language detection using Gemini Nano.

references.name: Chrome Summarizer API
